download_path = "/Users/nisnair/Desktop/MIDS/Coursework/Term5/W241/Assignments/FinalProject/W241/final_project"

#Randomize the index with 1 or 0
randomize <- function() { 
  sample(c(rep(0,20),rep(1,20)))
}

assign_resume <- function(company_id){
  user <- randomize()
  good <- company_id*user
  bad <- company_id*(1-user) 
  return (data.frame(good = good[good != 0],
                    bad = bad[bad != 0]))
}

#Get assignments for users in CA
company_id_ca <- c(1:40)
user_1 = assign_resume(company_id_ca)
write.table(user_1,paste(download_path,"/user1.txt",sep=""), sep="\t")

user_2 = assign_resume(company_id_ca)
write.table(user_2, paste(download_path,"/user2.txt",sep=""), sep="\t")
